content: the wanderlust beanie is designed for those wild at heart individuals who feel called to explore to travel and to blaze new trails i designed this hat with lion brand heartland yarn making it soft and cozy yet lightweight enough for summer evenings not only would this beanie serve you well on a camping or hiking trip it would also make an excellent piece to donate to charitable organizations that provide hats for cancer patients matching mitten pattern is available here 1 matching scarf pattern is available here 2 *this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link below or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf* additional sizing for toddlers and kids is now available over here 3 the stitch pattern in this beanie is fairly simple making it an excellent crochet pattern for those who have mastered the basics single half-double and double_crochet and want to play around with them in new ways while i originally designed this as a men s beanie the pattern is just as usable for women you will probably want to go down a hook size since this hat as written will fit a 25 head so long as you meet gauge here s what you ll need to create your own wanderlust experience **difficulty ** easy **materials needed ** 5 5mm i hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 225 yards of lion brand heartland yarn in joshua tree scissors yarn needle optional leather or fabric tag of your choosing all this wood has some excellent options and can do custom orders **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet bpdc = back post double_crochet st/sts = stitch/stitches **additional terms ** working in the 3rd loop of half_double_crochet look at the top of the stitch and locate the sideways v bend the stitch to look at the back and you should see another v you ll be working into the back loop of that v this is called the 3rd loop **gauge ** 14 half_double_crochet stitches in 4 **measurements ** 10 wide x 9 tall **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch -final st of round will be worked in the join when increasing -while i originally designed this as a men s beanie the pattern is just as usable for women you will probably want to go down a hook size since this hat as written will fit a 25 head so long as you meet gauge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wanderlust-mittens 2 https //www ravelry
